content: Introduced in 1998 as a quick fix to the former versions, version 1.2 was the start of a new beginning for Java. The JDKs of version 1.2 and later versions are often called Java 2 as well. For example, the official name of JDK 1.4 is The Java(TM) 2 Platform, Standard Edition version 1.4.
stemmed: introduc 1998 quick fix former version , version 1.2 start new begin java . the jdk version 1.2 later version often call java 2 well . for exampl , offici name jdk 1.4 the java ( TM ) 2 platform , standard edit version 1.4 .
